discourse_list.title: Bankless alleges fraud on the part of TAC

content.content: They are stating there are reports that 3AC falsified funds with at least 2 lenders. Also they claim allowing other traders to use their accounts on crypto exchanges is also illegal, and there have been independent accounts of that.

When I think back to November, we were all very naive and did not analyze it concretely, we should have been suspicious of all the huge vaults, also at aave, just those who are over-indebted were the most confident and the most arrogant. It is also a mirror to us I mean just on chain one could observe aggressive borrowing. DeFi has shown that it always works even in strong market turbulence, but it is a pity that we could not properly assess the risk. But who can time the market. Strong learnings are definitely to be taken, even more I appreciate that we had no extra treatment for large vaults but all Liq 2.0 has run automated, and how well the whole protocol works.
